cancelButton.description: The button to click to cancel the action

connectButton.description: The text on the Connect-button on the welcome-page

disconnect.description: The text for the link which enables users to disconnect their account.

error.description: The text to show when sending the data failed.
error.message: We were unable to send this page to your $deviceName$. $tryAgain$

errorGeneratingSnapshot.description: The text to show when we were unable to generate a snapshot.
errorGeneratingSnapshot.message: An error occured while generating the snapshot.

errorRetrieving.description: The text to show when we were unable to fetch the users list of mobile devices.
errorRetrieving.message: We were unable to connect to your mobile devices. $tryAgain$

extensionDescription.message: Send web pages from Chrome on your computer to Chrome on your phone or tablet.

extensionNameBeta.description: Extension name for when the extension is in beta

includeSnapshotMessage.description: The label text for the checkbox button used to indicate whether a snapshot should be sent, while the snapshot is being generated.
includeSnapshotMessage.message: Also send copy for offline viewing (generating...)

includeSnapshotMessageWithSize.description: The label text for the checkbox button used to indicate whether a snapshot should be sent, including the size of the copy.
includeSnapshotMessageWithSize.message: Also send copy for offline viewing ($size$).

learnMore.description: The link text to use when the user wants to know more about the feature.

noMobileDevicesFound.description: The message to show if the user has not registered any mobile devices.
noMobileDevicesFound.message: No devices found. Connect a mobile device. $learnMore$

learnMore.description: This will be surrounded by a link to learn more.

progress1.description: The initial part of an animating ellipsis

progress2.description: The second part of an animating ellipsis

progress3.description: The third part of an animating ellipsis

searchingForDevices.description: The text to show when we are currently retrieving a list of devices from Cloud Print

sendButton.description: The button to click to send a page to the device

sendThisPageTo.description: The text to show that explains the list of devices

sendThisPageToList.description: The text to show that explains the list of devices

sending.description: The text to show while we are sending data

sent.description: The text to show while we are have successfully sent data

snapshotDisabledMessage.description: The message displayed to indicate that the current version of Chrome does not support the snapshot generation API
snapshotDisabledMessage.message: This version of Chrome does not support snapshots. Snapshots are offline browsable version of a page. Make sure to use the dev channel version to enable snapshots.

tryAgain.description: The text to show as a clickable link if we want the user to try an action again, such as fetching devices on error or sending a page again.

welcomeMessage.description: The message to show the user before she signs in
welcomeMessage.message: Send web pages to your phone or tablet.
